policies.title: Budget Approval Process
policies.content: All departmental budget requests must be submitted by the 25th of each month. Expenditures under $10,000 can be approved by department heads. Expenditures between $10,000-$50,000 require Chief of Staff approval. Expenditures over $50,000 require CEO approval.

policies.title: Hiring Protocol
policies.content: All new hires require: 1) Position justification document, 2) Three rounds of interviews including one with HR, 3) Background check completion, 4) Final approval by department head and Chief of Staff.

policies.title: Vendor Management
policies.content: New vendors must pass security audit. Contracts over $25,000 require legal review. All vendor relationships must be documented in the CRM system.

policies.title: Marketing Expenditure
policies.content: Marketing budget cannot exceed 15% of quarterly revenue. All campaigns require ROI projection. Social media campaigns require brand guideline compliance check.

policies.title: Data Security
policies.content: All customer data must be encrypted. Third-party data sharing requires CTO approval. Breach notification must occur within 24 hours.

past_decisions.decision: Approved $40,000 with requirement for detailed ROI tracking
past_decisions.reasoning: Within budget limits, aligned with Q2 goals, but trimmed based on historical ROI data

past_decisions.situation: Engineering wanted to hire senior developer at $180,000
past_decisions.decision: Approved with condition of 6-month performance review
past_decisions.reasoning: Critical role for product roadmap, within market rate, but added review for accountability

past_decisions.situation: Request to share customer data with analytics vendor
past_decisions.decision: Denied until vendor completes security audit
past_decisions.reasoning: POL-005 requires security audit for all vendors before data sharing
